quotes.source: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets, J.K. Rowling
quotes.text: 🧙‍♂️ 'It is our choices that show what we truly are, far more than our abilities.'

quotes.source: The Fellowship of the Ring, J.R.R. Tolkien
quotes.text: 🍃 'Even the smallest person can change the course of the future.'
🥋 'The successful warrior is the average man, with laser-like focus.'
🕶️ 'There's a difference between knowing the path and walking the path.'
💡 'Genius is one percent inspiration and ninety-nine percent perspiration.'
🔍 'I think and think for months and years. The hundredth time I am right.'
🗡️ 'It's dangerous to go distracted! Stay sharp.'
🌌 'Do or do not, there is no try.'
🥊 'It ain’t about how hard you hit. It’s about how hard you can get hit and keep moving forward.'
🐸 'Feels good man, to accomplish your goals.'
🎥 'Just Do It! Don't let your dreams be dreams.'
